Feats-General -- Female Skilled Human Rogue: 3
Strength: +1 Dexterity: +2 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +2 Wisdom: +1 Charisma: +0
Background: Teacher Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 2185/3000 Level: 3 Speed: 30 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Fleet: +5 Speed
Breath Control: Can hold breath for 175 rd without suffocating
Feather Step: Can Step into difficult terrain
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 2; Class: 2; General: 1; Skill: 3 Selectable Feature Count: Human (Heritage); Rogue (Racket)
Feats: Additional Lore (Desert Lore); Adopted Ancestry (Dwarf); Ancestral Paragon; Armor Proficiency; Breath Control; Canny Acumen (Fortitude); Canny Acumen (Perception); Canny Acumen (Reflex); Canny Acumen (Will); Charming Liar; Diehard; Expeditious Search; Fast Recovery; Feather Step; Fleet; Incredible Initiative; Incredible Investiture; Nimble Dodge; Pet; Prescient Consumable; Prescient Planner; Ride; Shield Block; Skill Training (Outer Rifts Lore); Toughness; Tumble Behind; Unconventional Weaponry (Greatpick); Unconventional Weaponry (Light Pick); Untrained Improvisation; Weapon Proficiency (Dwarven Waraxe) Rogue Features: Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Rogue); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); Deny Advantage; General Feats; Perception Expert; Rogue Feats; Rogue Key Attribute; Rogue Skills; Rogue's Racket; Save Expert (Reflex; Will); Save Trained (Fortitude); Scoundrel; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Sneak Attack; Surprise Attack Teacher Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Experienced Professional; Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Performance, Society; Academia Lore) Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage; Skilled Human
Feature Notes:
Ancestral Paragon: +1 Ancestry Feat
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
General Feats: 1 selections
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Rogue Feats: 2 selections
Rogue's Racket: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 3 selections
Adopted Ancestry (Dwarf): May take Dwarf ancestry feats
Pet: Has a Tiny animal minion with the same level, modifiers, and AC as self, 15 Hit Points, low-light vision, 25' Speed, and creature-specific abilities
Prescient Consumable: Can retrieve an undeclared consumable from backpack once per shopping trip
Prescient Planner: Can retrieve an undeclared piece of adventuring gear from backpack once per shopping trip
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command an Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Rogue Key Attribute: 1 selection
Perception: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Academia Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Goblin Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Plains Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained)
Acrobatics: +3 (dexterity; untrained) Hunting Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +2 (wisdom; untrained)
Arcana: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) Scribing Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +6 (strength; trained) Iomedae Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Society: +7 (intelligence; trained)
Crafting: +7 (intelligence; trained) Magnimar Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +7 (dexterity; trained)
Deception: +5 (charisma; trained) Medicine: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +2 (wisdom; untrained)
Desert Lore: +9 (intelligence; expert) Nature: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Thievery: +3 (dexterity; untrained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Desert Lore): Skill Expert (Desert Lore)
Canny Acumen (Perception): Perception Expert
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 9 from any)
Scoundrel: Skill Trained (Deception; Diplomacy)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Skill Training (Outer Rifts Lore): Skill Trained (Outer Rifts Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +1 on untrained skill checks
Charming Liar: Critical success on a Lie improves a target's attitude by 1 step once per conversation
Expeditious Search: Can Search at 2x normal Speed
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Combat
Hit Points: 41 Armor Class: 19 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Rogue: 5 (%1; %2)
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Crossbow (+7 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Heavy Crossbow (+7 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Lesser Acid Flask (+7 1 E R20'; dexterity; trained)
Combat Notes:
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +6
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Toughness: +3 Hit Points
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Light Pick as one category simpler
Weapon Proficiency (Dwarven Waraxe): Attack Trained (Dwarven Waraxe)
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of equal or lower level
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Nimble Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class against an attack when unencumbered
Scoundrel: Successful Feint inflicts off-guard on foe vs. self attacks, or all attacks on a critical success, until the end of the next turn/Successful Feint with an agile or finesse weapon gives a free Step
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or ranged weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard on creatures that haven't acted
Tumble Behind: Successful Tumble Through inflicts off-guard against next self attack before the end of the turn
Save: Fortitude: +9 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Expert (Fortitude)
Canny Acumen (Reflex): Save Expert (Reflex)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Expert (Will)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats, and successes vs. inhaled threats are critical successes
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Magic Notes: Incredible Investiture: Can invest 12 items
Notes
Validation Errors:
Expeditious Search Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and perception rank (currently 2) >= 2
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 4 available vs. 26 allocated
Incredible Investiture Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 11 and charisma modifier >= 3
Prescient Consumable Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and prescient planner feature (currently 1)
